sentences.sContent: She leaned on the door, but it wouldn’t budge.
sentences.sCn: 她靠在门上，但是门纹丝不动。

sentences.sContent: The horse refused to budge an inch .

synos.tran: 挪动；微微移动；改变态度或意见；服从
使让步；移动；使改变态度或意见

trans.tranCn: 挪动；微微移动；改变态度或意见；服从
trans.tranOther: to move, or to make someone or something move
